Title: Bullet Train
Storyline: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

Title: The Batman
Storyline: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Title: The Godfather
Storyline: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

Title: The Dark Knight
Storyline: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Title: The Bad Guys
Storyline: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretend to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to secretly find that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

Title: Emily the Criminal
Storyline: Down on her luck and saddled with debt, Emily gets involved in a credit card scam that pulls her into the criminal underworld of Los Angeles, ultimately leading to deadly consequences.

Title: The Outfit
Storyline: An expert cutter must outwit a dangerous group of mobsters in order to survive a fateful night.

Title: The Gentlemen
Storyline: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

Title: Goodfellas
Storyline: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

Title: John Wick
Storyline: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took his car.

Title: Léon: The Professional
Storyline: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

Title: The Departed
Storyline: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: Super Mario Bros.
Storyline: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

Title: Nobody
Storyline: A docile family man slowly reveals his true character after his house gets burgled by two petty thieves, which, coincidentally, leads him into a bloody war with a Russian crime boss.

Title: Drive
Storyline: A mysterious Hollywood action film stuntman gets in trouble with gangsters when he tries to help his neighbor's husband rob a pawn shop while serving as his getaway driver,

Title: The Equalizer
Storyline: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

Title: Suicide Squad
Storyline: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

Title: Heat
Storyline: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

Title: The Godfather Part II
Storyline: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: Reservoir Dogs
Storyline: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: The Irishman
Storyline: Hitman Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
Storyline: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

Title: The Usual Suspects
Storyline: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

Title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Storyline: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Title: Scarface
Storyline: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

Title: Zootopia
Storyline: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Storyline: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Title: Deadpool 2
Storyline: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

Title: Kick-Ass
Storyline: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

Title: Casino
Storyline: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

Title: City of God
Storyline: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: Baby Driver
Storyline: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
Storyline: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Storyline: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

Title: Sing
Storyline: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

Title: Sin City
Storyline: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

Title: Batman Begins
Storyline: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 2
Storyline: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

Title: Sicario
Storyline: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

Title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
Storyline: Board the Millennium Falcon and journey to a galaxy far, far away in an epic action-adventure that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

Title: Road House
Storyline: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

Title: The Godfather Part III
Storyline: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

Title: Romeo + Juliet
Storyline: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

Title: The Mask
Storyline: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

Title: Beverly Hills Cop
Storyline: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

Title: True Romance
Storyline: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

Title: Molly's Game
Storyline: The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

Title: Red Sparrow
Storyline: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

Title: The Town
Storyline: A proficient group of thieves rob a bank and hold Claire, the assistant manager, hostage. Things begin to get complicated when one of the crew members falls in love with Claire.

Title: Batman
Storyline: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

Title: Looper
Storyline: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

Title: American Hustle
Storyline: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.

Title: Polar
Storyline: A retiring assassin suddenly finds himself on the receiving end of a hit, contracted by none other than his own employer seeking to cash in on the pensions of aging employees.

Title: Collateral
Storyline: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

Title: A History of Violence
Storyline: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

Title: The Many Saints of Newark
Storyline: Witness the making of Tony Soprano. The story that reveals the humanity behind Tony's struggles and the influence his family - especially his uncle, Dickie Moltisanti - had over him becoming the most iconic mob boss of all time.

Title: The Sting
Storyline: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: Lucy
Storyline: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

Title: American Gangster
Storyline: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Title: Birds of Prey
Storyline: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroines Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

Title: Ava
Storyline: Ava is a deadly assassin who works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong she is forced to fight for her own survival.

Title: Extraction
Storyline: Tyler Rake, a fearless black market mercenary, embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

Title: Rush Hour
Storyline: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

Title: Natural Born Killers
Storyline: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

Title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Storyline: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

Title: L.A. Confidential
Storyline: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: Gangs of New York
Storyline: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

Title: GoldenEye
Storyline: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a Russian crime syndicate steals a secret space-based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" and James Bond has to stop them from using it.

Title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
Storyline: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

Title: Slumdog Millionaire
Storyline: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

Title: The Untouchables
Storyline: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

Title: Jack Reacher
Storyline: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper responsible for a mass shooting.

Title: Hustlers
Storyline: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

Title: Lethal Weapon
Storyline: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

Title: Weekend at Bernie's
Storyline: Two idiots try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

Title: A Bronx Tale
Storyline: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

Title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
Storyline: After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organization in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret agencies must band together to defeat a common enemy.

Title: Black Mass
Storyline: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

Title: Some Like It Hot
Storyline: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Title: Road to Perdition
Storyline: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

Title: Donnie Brasco
Storyline: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

Title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
Storyline: The drug war on the U.S.-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. To fight the war, federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with the mercurial Alejandro.

Title: The Boondock Saints
Storyline: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

Title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
Storyline: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

Title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
Storyline: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

Title: Traffic
Storyline: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

Title: Layer Cake
Storyline: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

Title: No Sudden Move
Storyline: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.

Title: Kick-Ass 2
Storyline: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

Title: Dredd
Storyline: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

Title: The Tourist
Storyline: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

Title: Blow
Storyline: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

Title: The Firm
Storyline: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

Title: Gunpowder Milkshake
Storyline: Three generations of women fight back against those who could take everything from them.

Title: Kate
Storyline: A jaded assassin assigned to target a yakuza clan has 24 hours to find out who poisoned her and get vengeance before she dies.

Title: RocknRolla
Storyline: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

Title: Reminiscence
Storyline: Nick Bannister, a private investigator of the mind, navigates the alluring world of the past when his life is changed by new client Mae. A simple case becomes an obsession after she disappears and he fights to learn the truth about her.

Title: The Mule
Storyline: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

Title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
Storyline: A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.

Title: Triple Frontier
Storyline: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.
